name: SnakeSnakeSnake (Djack D Donovan)
description:
Chomp, get longer, get faster!

SnakeSnakeSnake is a snake game with a twist, it utilise all of the pixels on your modern computer's screen by having a default game grid size of 1850 by 1000.  Also included are a 4k mode (3700 by 2000) and a 8k mode (7400 by 4000).

Controls:

WASD  / ↑←↓→ / ZQSD / IJKL / dpad / joystick

Controller supported but not recommended.

Tip:

Clean your screen, those aren't smudges you're seeing!
